oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.partition

Class PartitionInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.partition.PartitionInfo

  • public class PartitionInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a partition. Contains the id, geometry and number of elements. It expands its geometry as new points are added.
    Author:
    hsaucedo
